definition: father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房里，梁大妈继续跟马母说着当年的事。

sentences.english: Who does the devoutly Catholic Susan Boyle thank first in her liner notes?
sentences.chinese: 那么虔诚的天主教徒苏珊大妈会首先感谢谁呢？

sentences.english: Old Mother Adams next door couldn't pierce her daughter's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的亚当斯老大妈看不透女儿的心思。

sentences.english: Road to see a blind Uncle and a clothing of the past, Flowery cooperating.
sentences.chinese: 路上见到一个盲人大叔和一个衣杉蓝缕的大妈。

sentences.english: She responded, "Why, yes, I do know you Mr. Williams.
sentences.chinese: 大妈回答，“哎呀，当然认识，你是威廉先生。

sentences.english: Aunt Chen from the neighborhood committees often helps to resolve disputes among the dwellers.
sentences.chinese: 居委会的陈大妈经常为大家排忧解纷。

sentences.english: Mrs Sucksby leaned and hit her again.
sentences.chinese: 萨斯比大妈伸过来又打了她。

sentences.english: Aunt Wang is planning to buy a colour TV set next month.
sentences.chinese: 王大妈算计着下月买一台彩电。

sentences.english: Living in the fifth floor of the Dama Wang said the most effective mosquito control is Shachuang.
sentences.chinese: 住在五楼的王大妈说防蚊最管用的是纱窗。

sentences.english: Word Wang Dama to teacher send chicken soup, two people talked about their children.
sentences.chinese: 王大妈来给文老师送鸡汤时，两人聊起了各自的子女。

sentences.english: Aunt Liu had to bare the noise as before.
sentences.chinese: 刘大妈只得继续忍受着这扰人的水管声。

sentences.english: Hua’s wife followed him all the time and asked him gently, “Are you feeling better now?
sentences.chinese: 华大妈跟着他走，轻轻的问道，“小栓，你好些么？

sentences.english: Boyle was hugged by a fan as she tried to make her way through the airport.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊大妈试图通过机场通道时被一位热情的粉丝拥抱。

sentences.english: Mother Hucheloup, his wife, was a bearded and a very homely creature.
sentences.chinese: 他的老伴于什鲁大妈是个生着胡子模样儿怪丑的妇人。

sentences.english: The portress told me that he could not come to-day.
sentences.chinese: 那看门的大妈说他今天不能来。

sentences.english: Volunteers Hua Xie side volume while continuously seek the views of Aunt.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者谢华一边量，一边不断征求大妈的意见。

definition: eldest of father's younger brothers/uncle (term used to address a man about the age of one's father)
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
big sister/elder sister/older sister (also polite term of address for a girl or woman slightly older than the speaker)
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
